member.name: T:Bridge.Car
member.summary: Car sub class that inherits from the Vehicle base class. Base ticket price of car is 230

member.name: T:Bridge.MC
member.summary: MC sub class that inherits from the Vehicle base class. Base ticket price of car is 120

member.name: T:Bridge.Vehicle
member.summary: Vehicle object to store data of the vehicles license plate and the date of the bridge passing

member.name: P:Bridge.Vehicle.LicensePlate
member.summary: The vehicles identifier. Checks whether the license plate only contains numbers and alphabetic characters.

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Determines the price of the vehicle. The bool Brobizz decides whether or not to add a discount to the ticket price.
member.param: The bool deciding to give a discount. True for discount

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.VehicleType
member.summary: Determines the type of the vehicle
